1.12.2.1.1.0:
Now works on server!
Frontiers keep track of creator/owner.
Fixed bug in Index. Unnamed frontiers have incorrect characters.
Fixed bug in saved frontiers. Name visibility is not saved.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Now you can change who can edit, create and delete frontiers! (Default key: F8).
Fixed marker of selected vertex not showing.
1.12.2.1.2.1: Fixed bug that prevented the player from creating frontiers and editing settings in singleplayer.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
Now you can assign a banner to the frontiers.
Added a HUD that shows the name, owner and banner of the frontier you're on now.
On the settings screen (F8 default key) you can edit the frontiers and HUD options.
1.12.2.1.3.1: Fixed bug that prevented the frontier slice value from being saved.
1.12.2.1.3.2:
Added Russian translation (Created by Articuno https://pixelmon.pro).
Fixed bug that crashed the client when a banner without patterns was assigned to a frontier.
